title: Philippe Sloksnath
text:
I am a Research and Teaching Assistant at the Department of Communication and Media Research at University of Zurich. My research is situated in Communication Science and Human-Computer Interaction, with a particular focus AI-based persuasion, misinformation, and media effects. I care about statistical inference, and transparent and reproducible research practices. Always happy to chat, so feel free to reach out!

Email: philippe.sloksnath@uzh.ch
GitHub: https://github.com/sloegge
LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/philippe-sloksnath
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/philippesloksnath.bsky.social
